subject: Increased Artifact Inventory Limit, New Battle Pass Weapons... Done! √ | Developers Discussion - 08/02
content:
Dear Travelers,

After the previous discussion was released, we received a lot of Travelers' attention and feedback. The developers are looking forward to continuing to communicate with everyone. Next, let's take a look at the content of this round of conversation~


〓Artifacts〓

We've been following all kinds of feedback from Travelers about Artifacts. As one of the most important game development experiences, the developers will continue to carry out optimizations in future versions.

After the Version 4.0 update, Travelers will be able to experience the following content:

· Artifact Inventory Limit will be increased to 1,800 from 1,500.

· 8 Artifact Sets that can be exchanged will be added to "Mystic Offering" in the Crafting Bench.


· The destruction function of Artifacts in your Inventory will be optimized, where you can add 4-Star Artifacts at once.


More optimizations for Artifacts are currently in the plans. Here, we would like to share some thoughts with you:

· Locking of Artifacts

The dev team has been looking for ways to reduce the cost of managing artifacts and improve your experience. We will optimize the locking function in the future, allowing Travelers to lock Artifacts that they want more easily.

· Equipping of Artifacts

Regarding the current cumbersome process of equipping Artifacts, we are currently discussing a new plan to help Travelers select and equip Artifacts as quickly as possible.

We are in the midst of discussing specific plans for the above optimizations. Once the details are confirmed, we will reveal them in detail in subsequent Developer Discussions.


〓New Content Preview〓

Next, we will share some new content in Version 4.0 with you. Let's take a look~

· New Battle Pass Weapons

There are now 10 types of weapons that can be selected from the BP Bounty. After unlocking the Gnostic Hymn and reaching Level 30, you can select one of the weapons as a reward. We will introduce the details of the new weapons via official information in the future.


· New Genius Invokation TCG Function: Observe Duel

Travelers can view the current Genius Invokation TCG match on the Friends or Co-Op Team screen.


*You can select whether you allow others to view the duel through the settings in the duel. (Default allows friends and Co-Op teammates to watch the duel)


· Adds Gyroscope controller support on some platforms

Gyroscope controller support and related settings have been added on PC, PS4™ and PS5™. Detailed rules can be found in Version 4.0 Update Details later.


〓New Chapter of Adventure: Fontaine〓

In the upcoming version, Travelers will head to Fontaine, the Nation of Justice. Fontaine encompasses vast areas of open water. With the blessing of the Transoceanic Sourcewater, you can freely traverse their depths and explore the unique scenery of Fontaine.

Before you embark on your journey, we have two adventure tips to share:

1. After the Version 4.0 update, if you have completed the Archon Quest in Mondstadt, a Teleport Waypoint in Sumeru's Realm of Farakhkert will unlock automatically. You will be able to use this to quickly arrive near Fontaine.

(*If you wish to advance in Fontaine's storyline, we recommend completing Archon Quest Chapter III: Act VI "Caribert.")

2. The Multi-Layered Map will be officially available after the Version 4.0 update. Travelers can use it to better understand the terrain of the area you're in and explore with ease. In addition to Fontaine, the Multi-Layered Map function will also be updated in some existing areas.

More information about Fontaine will be introduced in the Version 4.0 Special Program. Stay tuned~


〓Thoughts on the Future...〓

With the release of the new version, Travelers will get to explore tons of new content. The dev team has also noticed that the current Daily Commission mechanics are not flexible enough.

What we'd like to share here is that the relevant optimizations are currently in the pipeline. When the time comes, Travelers will be able to obtain daily rewards in a new format. We will introduce the details to you in future discussions.


And that's all, folks! If we gather new development insight, we'll be sure to take down notes and share them with you in time.

If you have any thoughts or feedback, you can also send them to us through channels within and outside of the game.

subject: Tips for Travelers - Preparations for Fontaine
content:
How exciting~ The journey to Fontaine is about to begin! After Version 4.0 comes online, Travelers who have completed Archon Quest Prologue: Act III "Song of the Dragon and Freedom" will automatically unlock a Teleport Waypoint in the Realm of Farakhkert in Sumeru. You will be able to use this to quickly arrive near Fontaine!


Though Travelers shouldn't forget to complete Archon Quest Chapter III: Act VI "Caribert"! After completing this quest, Travelers will be able to get the most out of the following Archon Quests in Fontaine. Let's get ready for our journey into Fontaine!

subject: Fontaine Live Symphony Performance | Genshin Impact
content:
This Fontaine Live Symphony Performance was filmed at the Roundhouse. Conducted by Robert Ziegler, the performance features the London Symphony Orchestra and top folk musicians performing two game soundtrack pieces produced by HOYO-MiX, "Fontaine" and "Rondeau des fleurs et des rapieres."


A big thank you to TAKEOFF Studios for providing folk music production, and to Stagecast for their support with filming and production.

A big thank you to TAKEOFF Studios for providing folk music production, and to Stagecast for their support with filming and production.

subject: About Genius Invokation TCG Tournament Card Backs
content:
Travelers, let's learn more about Genius Invokation TCG tournament card backs and how to get them!


How to Obtain

Meet any of the requirements in one of the following Genius Invokation TCG tournaments:

Win three victories during a single season of the officially authorized Genius Invokation TCG Community Competition "Cat's Tail Gathering" between S3–S5.

Win one victory in any of the 2023 "Astra Carnival: The Prince Cup" Wild Card competitions.


How to Obtain

Meet the following requirements:

Finish in the top 8 in any of the 2023 "Astra Carnival: The Prince Cup" competitions.

subject: Version 4.0 "Genius Invokation TCG" New Card Details
content:
Hello Travelers! After the Version 4.0 update, Albedo, Lisa, and Qiqi Character Cards, their corresponding Talent Cards as well as five Action Cards will be added to Genius Invokation TCG. Let's check them out!

After the Version 4.0 update, visit The Cat's Tail to invite the characters for a duel. Complete the specific challenge objectives to obtain the Character Cards and corresponding Talent Cards. New Action Cards can be purchased from the Card Shop.

*The developers will continue to pay close attention to Travelers' gaming experience, and make adjustments and optimizations to ensure that the card game is well-balanced. Please refer to the official in-game content for information about the cards.

subject: Version 4.0 Quest Notices Compilation
content:
New Story Unlocked - Archon Quest Chapter IV: Act I and Act II

You've learned many new things about the world and benefited greatly from your trip to Sumeru. What significance, then, will your next stop — Fontaine, the Nation of Justice and Judgment — have for your journey through Teyvat?


After reaching the corresponding Adventure Rank and completing the prerequisite quests, Archon Quest Chapter IV: Act I "Prelude of Blancheur and Noirceur" and Act II "As Light Rain Falls Without Reason" will appear in the Quest Menu.

(After these quests are unlocked, access the Quest Menu by: pressing "J" on PC (default settings); tapping the Quest Menu icon in the top-left corner on mobile; or pressing and holding L1 on PS5™ or PS4™ to open the shortcut wheel and select the Quest Menu icon.)


〓Quest Start Time〓

After the Version 4.0 update, Archon Quest Chapter IV: Act I "Prelude of Blancheur and Noirceur" and Archon Quest Chapter IV: Act II "As Light Rain Falls Without Reason" will be permanently available


〓Archon Quest Chapter IV: Act I "Prelude of Blancheur and Noirceur" Unlock Criteria〓

• Reach Adventure Rank 40 or above

• Complete Archon Quest Chapter III: Act VI "Caribert"


〓Archon Quest Chapter IV: Act II "As Light Rain Falls Without Reason" Unlock Criteria〓

• Reach Adventure Rank 40 or above

• Complete Archon Quest Chapter IV: Act I "Prelude of Blancheur and Noirceur"


"PlayStation", "PS5", "PS4", "DualSense", "DUALSHOCK" are registered trademarks or trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc.

"Felis Fuscus Chapter" Story Quest Overview

Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to use a Story Key to unlock Lyney's Story Quest "Felis Fuscus Chapter."

The Story Quest feature is unlocked at Adventure Rank 26. Story Keys are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed).


〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after the Version 4.0 update

〓Quest Unlock Criteria〓

Adventure Rank 40 or above

Complete Archon Quest Chapter IV: Act II "As Light Rain Falls Without Reason"

subject: Version 4.0 Event Notices Compilation
content:
"Relic Records: Creations of the Hydro Nation" Event: Survey the Sights of Fontaine

〓Event Duration〓

After the Version 4.0 update – 2023/08/28 03:59:59


〓Event Rewards〓

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

Unlock any Statue of The Seven in Fontaine


〓Event Details〓

● After the event begins, all exploration quests will be made available on the first day.

● During the event, Travelers need to collect specific types of harvestable items and challenge specified enemies. Complete the exploration tasks to obtain the rewards.

● While collecting the specified harvestable items, recommended collection sites will be marked on your map for certain items. Your mini-map will display nearby collectables when you get close to recommended sites.

● During the event, after you complete collection tasks, the recommended collection sites will be marked on your map. You can head to these locations to harvest the items if required.


"The Curtain Never Falls on Magic" Event: Take Part to Invite "Elegance in the Shadows" Lynette (Anemo)

〓Event Duration〓

Permanently available after the Version 4.0 update


〓Event Rewards〓

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 25 or above


〓Event Details〓

Reach Adventure Rank 25 to invite "Elegance in the Shadows" Lynette (Anemo) from the event page!

※ You can only win the reward for this event once. The event page will close once you have completed the challenge.


"Genius Invokation TCG" The Forge Realm's Temper: Game of Wits

〓Event Duration〓

Available throughout the entirety of Version 4.0


〓Event Rewards〓

subject: He who looks down on all that are haughty
content:
Someday, when they return, their true ordeal shall begin.

— Xbalanque, One Entombed With the Primal Fire


◆ Name: Neuvillette

◆ Title: Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment

◆ Iudex of Fontaine

◆ ???: Hydro

◆ Constellation: ???




"Given that our previous behind-the-scenes editorial on the Hydro Archon earned us the honorable epithet of 'tabloid journalism' from our dear Monsieur Neuvillette, this time we'll be focusing on the mysterious Iudex himself. We know little indeed of his true character, and sadly our multiple requests for an interview were all turned down. Instead, we have decided to reach out and draw upon the wisdom of the masses. In the pursuit of the truth, all anonymous submissions and attestations of manifestly questionable veracity have been filtered out. We were rather intrigued, however, by the following letter written in a particularly adorable script:

...

"If the Darknight Hero really does exist, he's probably just someone in disguise. When he gets up in the morning to brush his teeth, it's the real him. Only in the dead of night does he become the Darknight Hero. But not (Monsieur) Neuvillette. The Chief Justice IS the real him. For us Melusines, our ideal of the perfect father — that's also the real him. The only person that isn't really him is the one that goes by the name of Neuvillette."

From this, we can safely surmise... that Neuvillette must be the only male Melusine! Granted, the Melusines actually appeared much later than when Neuvillette took up his post. But in the face of such ironclad evidence, there's bound to be some way of explaining this!"

— Seven Nations Gazette, a notorious tabloid

subject: Guilty waters run deep
content:
"Navia, do you remember when I refused the title of 'Baron' bestowed upon me by the Palais Mermonia a few years back? Well, that's beside the point. Today, I finally met the Administrator of the Fortress of Meropide. I had always assumed that 'Duke' was simply a hollow title too... But it turns out that Wriothesley is far more worldly than he looks."

— Callas, former President of the Spina di Rosula


◆ Name: Wriothesley

◆ Title: Emissary of Solitary Iniquity

◆ Lord of the Fortress of Meropide

◆ Vision: Cryo

◆ Constellation: Cerberus




"Administrator of the Fortress of Meropide"

— If Wriothesley needed a namecard, this would suffice.

No foreword, and no epilogue. Just like that place of exiled convicts he's in charge of, standing there silently at the bottom of the sea.

Despite its discretion, as a resting place for criminals, the Fortress of Meropide harbors a network of conflicting interests that would have a corrupting influence on many.

But even if someone was bent on infiltrating this place, they'd soon be swallowed up like breadcrumbs in a bowl of soup.

Some have lauded His Grace's aptitude for taking care of thorny problems. Hearing such praise, Wriothesley would simply lower his teacup... and pick up his newspaper.

"You've got the wrong end of the stick. They just wanted somewhere to lead well-ordered lives, and I gave them the 'tranquility' they required."

subject: Quick Overview of the Underwater Map in Genshin Impact Version 4.0
content:
Dear Travelers,


Genshin Impact Version 4.0's new region of Fontaine is now available!

Related content has also been added to the Teyvat Interactive Map tool, and it supports switching between map layers. Let Mimo show you how to view it!


Click the button at the top to switch to the region of Fontaine and view the new map.

Click the Multi-Layered Map button on the home page to get an overview of different layers. Select layer entrances or pins to enter the Multi-Layered Map.

When using the Multi-Layered Map, Travelers can either select the ground layer to view content on the surface map, or the layers below to view the corresponding layer of the Underwater Map. Come explore the Underwater Map together!

>> Click to Enter the Teyvat Interactive Map <<


And that's how you view Fontaine's new map and switch between different layers.

Mimo hopes that being able to view different map layers makes exploration more convenient for Travelers! Please feel free to share your thoughts or any other related suggestions in the comments section~

subject: Come Check Out the Updated Genshin Impact Battle Chronicle!
content:
Dear Travelers,


With the arrival of Genshin Impact Version 4.0, the Battle Chronicle has been updated too~

Not only does it now cover all the new version areas, but some modules have been adjusted and had new content added as well.Let Mimo go through the specifics for you!


1. The personal information bar and data overview at the top of the Battle Chronicle homepage have been adjusted.

The personal information bar now shows your character portrait and UID, and you can now copy your UID here.

By default, the data overview shows your active days, number of achievements, number of characters, and the floor of the Spiral Abyss that you've reached. You can expand it to view other data. Hydroculi data has been added directly behind Dendroculi.


Additionally, browsing your data is now more convenient. The original "Data Details" entrance has been removed, and you can now tap any piece of data within the data overview to view specifics in the corresponding pop-up.

For example: Tap "Characters Obtained" to open the pop-up, and then "View Details" to go to the page with all characters for more details.

2. New content has also been added to the World Exploration module for Version 4.0.

World Exploration now has content from Fontaine, including your overall Exploration Progress in Fontaine, Exploration Progress in each sub-region, offering system progress, as well as your Reputation Level.

In addition, Event Review is expected to include Version 4.0's limited-time event "Mega Meka Melee" on the 24th, including specific challenge information for the 3 mini-events: Dance Dance Resolution, Torrential Turbulent Charge, and Efficacy Testing Simulation Arena.


3. More information has been added to the Spiral Abyss module.

When you tap "View More" to enter the Challenge Details page, Ley Line Disorder and Opponents' Details info has been added to the details for each floor, providing you with more vital intel on the Abyss!


>> Click to View Battle Chronicle <<


The above are all the content updates made to the Battle Chronicle. If you have any other ideas and suggestions while experiencing Version 4.0, please leave your valuable feedback in the comments section!

subject: Genshin Impact Gamescom Cologne 2023 Booth Guide
content:
Hey Travelers! This year, Genshin Impact will be taking part in Gamescom together with Honkai Impact 3rd, Honkai: Star Rail, and Zenless Zone Zero. It's sure to be a unique and unforgettable experience, so let's find out more!


Address: Messepl. 1, 50679 Köln, Deutschland

Booth Number: Hall 6, B030


Exhibition Layout

The Genshin Impact booth is divided into the "Shouki no Kami, the Prodigal" Check-In Spot, Game Experience Area, and the E-Sports Area (this will be a Check-In Spot when no e-sports events are scheduled). You can enter the venue from the entrance by the reception desk.

Word has it that mysterious elemental creatures will occasionally appear in the exhibition area too — feel free to take photos with them!


Genshin Impact, Honkai Impact 3rd, and Honkai: Star Rail merchandise will be sold in the Public Merchandise Area. Hope you've prepared your Mora...! We will provide a full merchandise list in the future to give you an advance overview.


There will be loads going on at the Genshin Impact Stage Area, including music performances, cosplay shows, e-sports events, influencer interaction sessions, and more! We're looking forward to meeting you all offstage!


Special Guest: Stormterror will be making a dramatic appearance at the north entrance, so don't forget to take a commemorative photo with the Erstwhile King of the Skies!


Genshin Impact Gamescom Cologne 2023 Adventurers Guide

Event

HoYoverse Event:

Present your Traveler ID (found on the in-game account screen) to the on-site staff or head to the Trial Play Area to play Genshin Impact for 10 minutes, and you'll receive a Genshin Impact Gamescom Cologne 2023 custom-made ticket, Genshin Impact-themed temporary tattoos, and a HoYoverse pamphlet.

Once you've collected the tickets for all the exhibition games, you will be able to exchange them for 1 HoYoverse Paper Bag.


Genshin Impact Exhibition Event:

Each participant will get a Slime hat and a Paimon-themed fan. Take photos of Genshin Impact creatures of different elements and share them on Instagram or Twitter with the hashtags #Gamescom and #GenshinGamescom to claim 1 poster.

(Recommended for Photos: "Slimes" and "Shouki no Kami, the Prodigal" inside the Genshin Impact booth, and "Stormterror" located near the north entrance)

All gifts are limited in quantity. First come, first served!


Programs

Special Guests

Kamui Cosplay, a content creator from Germany, will be putting on an amazing stage performance!


The French ACG band STARRYSKY will be playing some Genshin Impact classics to get everyone in the mood!


And our special guest, the renowned Italian cosplayer Taryn, will be making an appearance and interacting with you all!


Merchandise

We've also prepared loads of great merchandise for you to purchase. For more details, please check out our on-site roll up banner.

subject: Cat's Tail Gathering S4 will be open for registration from now to September 3!
content:
Travelers, the HoYoverse-authorized, Tavern-hosted Cat's Tail Gathering S4 Genius Invokation TCG Tournament is officially open for registration!

Register for a chance to win an event-exclusive Card Back and Primogem rewards!

Registration Link >>>

https://discord.com/invite/genshinimpacttavern


〓Registration Process〓

1. Obtain the Pleb role after joining the Genshin Impact Tavern Discord Server.

2. Go to the #Register channel under the Cat's Tail Gathering S4 category.

3. Click Register and fill out your registration information to participate in the event.

4. If you have any questions, please check the #tournament-faq channel for FAQs or post your questions in the #cats-tail-discussions channel.

*Check out the video below to learn how to register and participate in the event.

How to Participate >>>



〓Registration Period〓

From now – September 3, 23:59:59 (UTC+8)


〓Duration of Qualifiers〓

September 4 – September 10


〓Elimination Tournament Duration〓

September 18 – September 24

*The maximum number of people that can register for this event is 10,000, so be quick and don't miss out!


〓Qualifying Round Rewards〓

*Adds "Primogem Reward Accumulated" for respective Victories achieved.


Victories: The number of victories that players have won in the qualifiers.

Primogem Reward Per Victory: The number of Primogems that players can win for each individual victory.

*Primogem rewards in this event will provided by HoYoverse and will be sent to the winner's in-game mailbox within 30 business days after the event ends.

Card Back Reward

Register to take part in the qualifiers and win at least 3 victories to obtain an event-exclusive Card Back. Card Back rewards are expected to be issued in October 2023.

*Travelers who received this event-exclusive Card Back in Cat's Tail Gathering S3 will not be able to obtain the reward again.

*Card Back rewards are exclusive rewards provided by HoYoverse for specific competitions. They cannot be obtained via any other channels except these competitions.


〓Prizes〓

Champion: 1000 USD

First Runner-Up: 600 USD

Second Runner-Up: 300 USD

Fourth Place: 100 USD

Fifth – Eighth Place: 50 USD

*Travelers will be divided based on the servers their game accounts are from (Asia, America, Europe Servers). Each server has its own prize pool.


〓Eligibility〓

1. Participants must reach Genius Invokation TCG Player Level 4 or higher.

2. Participants must be able to stream on Discord and record their screens. (The last phase of the Elimination Tournament will be recorded.)

3. Participants must join the Genshin Impact Tavern Discord Srver.

*Server Link: https://discord.com/invite/genshinimpacttavern


〓Contest Format〓

1. Qualifiers: BO1, no limitation on Decks.

2. Elimination Tournament: BO3, no repeated use of Character cards. *Character Cards that have been used in previous matches cannot be used again.


〓Cat's Tail Gathering Q&A〓

1. What is "Cat's Tail Gathering"?

The "Cat's Tail Gathering" is a Genius Invokation TCG competition organized by the Genshin Impact Tavern community and authorized by HoYoverse. Participants will accrue points through matches. During the one-week-long Qualifiers, participants will match with other contenders multiple times, and winners will accumulate points over the course. The top 16 will enter the Elimination Tournament to contest for the championship and the grand prizes!

2. Who are eligible to participate in the "Cat's Tail Gathering" competition?

The "Cat's Tail Gathering" Genius Invokation TCG Community Competition is available to all Travelers. Reach Player Level 4 or higher and join the Genshin Impact Tavern Discord Community to register!

3. What's the relationship between the Cat's Tail Gathering and the "Astra Carnival: The Prince Cup"?

"Cat's Tail Gathering" is a part of the "Astra Carnival: The Prince Cup." Participants who stand out in the "Cat's Tail Gathering" Community Competition will have the chance to be invited to the "Astra Carnival: The Prince Cup"!

subject: Version 4.0 Event Wishes Notice - Phase II
content:
Event Wish "Gentry of Hermitage" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Vago Mundo" Zhongli (Geo)!

Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!

〓Event Wish Duration〓

2023/9/5 18:00:00—2023/9/26 14:59:59


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Vago Mundo" Zhongli (Geo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Yearning for Unseen Depths" Freminet (Cryo), "Mujina Ninja" Sayu (Anemo), and "Chivalric Blossom" Noelle (Geo) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● After this event wish ends, the 4-star character "Yearning for Unseen Depths" Freminet (Cryo) will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" in the next Version.

※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

※ This is for "Character Event Wish." The wish guarantee count for "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2" is shared, and is accumulated between both "Character Event Wish" and "Character Event Wish-2." This wish guarantee count is independent of the guarantee counts of other types of wishes.

※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.
